product_name: Acorn Descent Mule Slippers - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The men's Acorn Descent Mule slippers feature a blend of acrylic and Italian wool to keep feet cozy through the long and cold winter months. Cozy uppers feature a blend of acrylic and Italian wool; suede leather accents help protect uppers to enhance durability. Elastic gores enable a tailored, comfortable fit and slip-on ease. Polyester flannel linings are soft against skin and wick moisture away from feet. Contoured footbeds enhance support underfoot and provide lightweight cushioning. Flexible and lightweight rubber outsoles deliver traction indoors and on brief jaunts outside. Closeout.
short_description: The men's Acorn Descent Mule slippers feature a blend of acrylic and Italian wool to keep feet cozy through the long and cold winter months.
